template.name: function GOOD standalone
template.value:
def $name$(x,y): """ $name$ """ if not x or not y: raise ValueError("Method input argument must not be empty.") assert isinstance(x,str) and isinstance(y,str)
print (f"{x} {y}")
assert x and y , "Check invariant - result is not empty"
$name$(x=1,y=2) $END$

template.name: function use external vars
template.value:
v="no" def $name$(x,y): """ $name$ """ if not x or not y: raise ValueError("Method input argument must not be empty.") assert isinstance(x,str) and isinstance(y,str)
global v nonlocal w v="yes" print (f"{x} {y}")
assert x and y , "Check invariant - result is not empty"
$name$(x=1,y=2) $END$

template.name: function multiple results
function with default args
template.value:
def $name$(*,x=11,y=12): """ $name$ """ if not x or not y: raise ValueError("Method input argument must not be empty.") assert isinstance(x,str) and isinstance(y,str)
print (f"{x} {y}")
assert x and y , "Check invariant - result is not empty"
$name$(x=1,y=2) $END$

template.name: function oneline aka lambda
template.value: def func(x, у, z): return x + у + z

template.name: function GEN yield with for
function decorator
template.value:
#функция перенесет все __метаданные на обёртку декоратор from functools import * @wraps(func)
$END$

template.name: function GEN simpliest
function GOOD GRAPH input argument
